page.title: 12MY DAY BY ZAC
page.content: My day starts when I get up at 7.30.I wash,have breakfast,get changed and go to school by 8.10 a.m.when I play games on the computer.We have Assembly,Mathematics and Reading until Break at 10.45.From 11a.m.to noon we have Creative Writing.We have lunch and play out until 1p.m.We have various lessons until 3.20 with a break from 2.10-2.25p.m.After school I stay with my mother ,who is Caretaker, and I practise the piano.At 5.15 I go for tea.If fine after tea we go to the boat on the canal at Copley or I play in the field.If it is wet we watch television,read or play on the computer.Then after a wash I go to bed.
